cast.overview: Cousins Dyosa and Claudia's lives change when a carnival arrives in their town. As they both surrender their innocence to the carnival men, their dreams come crashing down.
cast.title: Torn Heaven

cast.overview: Ivy is pursued by first love Miyo, but is in a relationship with Bianca, who happens to be Miyo's boss. Meanwhile, Miyo's ex April pursues Miyo, but is also open to a threesome with Ivy? Which one tastes like love?
cast.title: Patikim-tikim

cast.overview: Abie mourns after the death of Michael. She finds solace from her supposedly soon-to-be father-in-law, Roldan, and starts falling for him. But when Michael returns, their world turns upside down.
cast.title: Tuhog

cast.overview: When a battered mistress meets her neighbor, she knows he will be her perfect escape plan. But things turn chaotic when their plan backfires.
cast.title: Karinyo Brutal

cast.overview: A rich woman marries a charming womanizer who conspires with his wife’s best friend. When all the revelations are exposed, the tables suddenly turn.
cast.title: Balinsasayaw

cast.overview: A student taking on an unusual ”daddysitter” job. As she grows close to her wealthy, ill client, his estranged son’s return complicates everything.
cast.title: Daddysitter

cast.overview: Kat is a beautiful DJ who immediately catches the eye of pansexual woman Denise. But while Kat falls for Denise, she’s just one of the many partners Denise plays around with. Will Kat learn to be okay with their set-up or will Denise change her ways for Kat?
cast.title: Baligtaran

cast.overview: A steamy tale of love, lust, and betrayal. When Adele's sister Bea returns with her girlfriend Cheska, a secret affair begins between Cheska and Adele's boyfriend, Rener, leading to a climactic ending when they're caught.
cast.title: Kiskisan

cast.overview: Robin, a young student, is obsessed with Tanya, his teacher. He then sees Tanya kissing a female student, so he blackmails her. When Robin believes that he is in control, he learns Tanya's dark personality.
cast.title: Teacher's Pet

cast.overview: With 12M+ fans, VMX turned up the heat in 2024 with record-breaking, steamy films from top Filipino directors, starring your fave crushes and fresh faces. Join Robb Guinto & Apple Dy as they dive into the hottest scenes that left us sweating!
cast.title: Climax

cast.overview: A desperate wife whose husband is shot after a robbery attempt. Desperate to help him financially, she turns to Kap, a man who's always been interested in her, sparking an affair that shatters their relationships.
cast.title: Delusyon

cast.overview: A tale of seduction and mystery. A fearless pre-law student joins an elite sorority led by a powerful heiress. As secrets unfold, she’s torn between the woman who awakened her desire and a truth that could destroy them both.
cast.title: Sorority
